Package emissary.core

Class IBaseDataObjectXmlCodecs

java.lang.Object
emissary.core.IBaseDataObjectXmlCodecs
public final class IBaseDataObjectXmlCodecs extends Object
This class contains the interfaces and implementations used to convert an IBDO->XML and XML->IBDO.

  • Nested Class Summary

    • BASE64_ENCODER

      public static final Base64.Encoder BASE64_ENCODER
      The Base64 encoder. Uses same width as default, but overrides new line separator to use normalized XML separator. See http://www.jdom.org/docs/apidocs/org/jdom2/output/Format.html#setLineSeparator(java.lang.String)

  • Method Details

    • extractBytes

      public static byte[] extractBytes(String encoding, String elementValue)
      Return UTF8 bytes from an XML value, decoding base64 if required
      Parameters:
      encoding - e.g. 'base64', otherwise it returns the bytes as they are presented
      elementValue - containing the data
      Returns:
      the data from elementValue, decoded from base64 if required

    • preserve

      public static org.jdom2.Element preserve(org.jdom2.Element element)
      Adds preservation attributes to an XML element.
      Parameters:
      element - to add preservation attributes to.
      Returns:
      the element passed in with the preservation elements added.

    • protectedElement

      public static org.jdom2.Element protectedElement(String name, String string)
      Creates a protected XML string element.
      Parameters:
      name - of the XML element
      string - value of the XML element
      Returns:
      the protected XML element.

    • protectedElementBase64

      public static org.jdom2.Element protectedElementBase64(String name, byte[] bytes)
      Creates a 'protected' element which can be encoded with base64 if it contains non-printable characters See method source for specific definition of 'non-printable'.
      Parameters:
      name - of the element
      bytes - to wrap, if they contain non-printable characters
      Returns:
      the created element

    • protectedElementSha256

      public static org.jdom2.Element protectedElementSha256(String name, byte[] bytes)
      Creates a 'protected' element which can be hashed with sha256 if it contains non-printable characters See method source for specific definition of 'non-printable'.
      Parameters:
      name - of the element
      bytes - to wrap, if they contain non-printable characters.
      Returns:
      the created element

    • getIbdoMethod

      public static Method getIbdoMethod(String methodName, Class<?>... parameterTypes) throws NoSuchMethodException, SecurityException
      Gets the requested method object from the IBaseDataObject class.
      Parameters:
      methodName - name of the ibdo method
      parameterTypes - list of ibdo method parameter types
      Returns:
      the ibdo method object
      Throws:
      SecurityException - if a security manager is present and encounters a problem.
      NoSuchMethodException - if a matching method is not found
